channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
Hai,
I saw you can portforward using uTorrent so that you don't need your browser to do it. Let's say I want to be able to play my server with like 2 other friends, If i download uTorrent and use it on port 43594 (or whatever the default was), can ANYONE connect to my server? Cause I don't want to make it public, just for IRL friends, not some random people.
Would I be able to use hamachi and uTorrent ONLY (with a dynamic IP) in order to succesfully host a server (without making it public, like, when they have my hamachi network, they can connect, otherwise they can't)?
I hope you understand what I'm trying to say. :)

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

yea thats what i thought also but whenever my mate changes the server ip to my hamachi ip in client.java and then tries to connect, it keeps saying error connecting to server :<

Just give him your client with hamachi ip adress. it will auto connect to your pc

Read full topic

If you use hamachi , than i think only hamachi is needed.
